name: Heartland Solutions Group, Inc.
goal: Heartland Solutions Group (HSG) is a policy advocacy and reputation management consulting firm which supports corporate, association, governmental and non-profit clients in engaging the full spectrum of external stakeholders which impact brand and corporate reputation, business operations and long-term organizational success.  As part of this, HSG provides clients with turn-key, outsourced management solutions that enable them to effectively advance their policy and reputational positioning objectives.
euInitiatives: Policies related to and governing the Internet of Things.
